page.title: 02POPULATION IN FERNESS
page.content:
RESULTS OF SURVEY IN GRID AREA POPULATION:- 0- 4yrs - 6 5-16 " -14 MALES - 29 17-25 " - 7 26-40 " -22 FEMALES - 37 40-65 " -10 65+ " - 7 TOTAL - 66
